cause.description:
http://www.active.com/donate/tntgla/tntglaLSweene1
1. The Society invested $61.6 million to support more than 480 researchers and projects in 15 countries on five continents.
2. The Society also provides financial assistance to patients and runs dozens of Family Support Groups nationwide.
3. The Society sponsors scientific conferences around the country; produces educational materials and videos.
cause.mission: The Society's mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families.
cause.name: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society Team in Training
